attributes.action: instruct the NSC to EMdrive- if it works- to a DMC DeLorean
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the National Space Center is currently researching a device called the EMdrive which would- if it works- allow a car to "float".
This petition is to request that the Prime Minister orders the NSC to fit it to a DMC DeLorean for its first public showing.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
